note.p: Burial: St Giles' cemetery, now Ascension Cemetery, Cambridge
Education: Magdalene College, Cambridge. BA (1853), MA

Career: Fellow of Magdalene College, Cambridge; Drury Travelling Fellow, studying ornithology in Lapland and Iceland (1854-1863); Professor of Zoology and Comparative Anatomy, University of Cambridge (1866-1907); died of heart disease
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1908 vol 80 pp xlv-xlix signed by A G
References: Sir Gavin de Beer, ed, 'Some Unpublished Letters of Charles Darwin' in NR 1959 vol 14 pp 12-66
